ygData.subject: Re: Language Impaired
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Actually, this is the most efficient way of increaseing your language skill. Just get a group together, and spam eachother in the language you wish to
ygData.messageBody:
>
>
> Just curious as I have little experience with languages....
> can you increase your language ability by grouping with someone and then
> using group talk to increase skill? The other member of the group won't get
> anything out of it, I know, but will you?
>
> --
> Bahir
>

Actually, this is the most efficient way of increaseing your language skill.
Just get a group together, and spam eachother in the language you wish to teach
them. Here's another hint. You can teach a person up to 1 in skill better
than yours, so if you put a point in, you can teach your freind to 2. Then you
zone. He teaches you to 3. Zone. You teach him to 4. Etc.
